NASA's Earth Science Division (ESD) missions help us to understand our planet's interconnected systems, from a global scale down to minute processes.
Earth Science deals with any and all aspects of the Earth. Our Earth has molten lava, icy mountain peaks, steep canyons and towering waterfalls.
The 'study of the earth' is quite a broad concept, as a result, there are many subdisciplines within the Earth and environmental sciences.
Introduction. Earth Science is the study of the Earth and its neighbors in space. It is an exciting science with many interesting and practical applications.
